token_info.name: Flocking Boids
token_info.description: Conteplating upon the networking on semi-intelligent entities and their ways of flocking to create invisible geometric patterns; while others are left behind and vanish. Each agent is following a rigit set of rules to decide its position and velocity, by examining what its neighbours are doing. Aren't we all doing that ? Original code created for the #Genuary2021 coding challenge. This is the very first NFT minted by Aevin on Hic Et Nunc.  All animated in real time.
